mapper.sql: id, asset_name, type, version, manufacture, price, status, purchase_date, life, is_lend, is_visible, manage_id, warehouse_id, asset_num, remarks, is_delete

select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from asset_info
order by ${orderByClause}
